entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -16.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 11:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -16.7°C
Pressure: 103.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -20.8°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening then changing to ice pellets then changing to freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or rain showers. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or rain showers. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
